feed.title: BORIS is an easy-to-use event logging software for video/audio coding and live observations.

entry.title: v. 7.2 is available
entry.content: The v. 7.2 is available. Improved spectrogram and ffmpeg processes. Fix some bugs
entry.summary: The v. 7.2 is available. Improved spectrogram and ffmpeg processes. Fix some bugs

entry.title: v. 7.1.4 is available
entry.content: The v. 7.1.4 is available. Fixed bug during spectrogram generation under Mac and Linux
entry.summary: The v. 7.1.4 is available. Fixed bug during spectrogram generation under Mac and Linux

entry.title: v. 7.1.3 is available

entry.title: v. 7.1.2 is available

entry.title: v. 7.1 is available
entry.content: The v. 7.1 is available. Added time edit and copy/paste events functions
